alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 6:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH HEAVY RAIN, GRAUPEL AND SNOW WILL AFFECT CENTRAL WEBER...NORTH CENTRAL DAVIS AND NORTHWESTERN MORGAN COUNTIES... At 639 PM MDT...An area of thunderstorms with mixed heavy rain, graupel and snow was over Hooper, or 8 miles northwest of Hill Air Force Base...moving east at 20 mph. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Syracuse, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper, South Weber, Marriott-Slaterville, Uintah, Weber State University, West Haven, West Point, Pleasant View and Farr West. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 334 and 351. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 92. * winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of graupel. * locally heavy mixed precipitation will lead to reduced visibility and may lead to difficult driving conditions. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
